T02D2379:12a-1: badzra d'a ki ni nishpan na kra ma /
T02D2379:12a-3: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa /
T02D2379:12a-4: rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2379:12a-5: rdo re mkha' 'gro gzhu ru thogs //
T02D2379:12a-6: dngos po thams cad 'ben du btsugs //
T02D2379:12a-7: gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab //
T02D2379:12b-0: bsgom @12b dang sgom rgyu dmigs pa med //
T02D2379:12b-1: bsnun pas skye ba dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02D2379:12b-2: bdag gzhan gnyis kyi mtha' yang bcad //
T02D2379:12b-3: gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab //
T02D2379:12b-4: bsgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med //
T02D2379:12b-5: stong pa'i gzhu ni bkang byas nas //
T02D2379:12b-6: shor med mda' ni rdeg par byed //
T02D2379:12b-7: bsad dang gsad bya gnyis ka mad //
T02D2379:12b-8: gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab //
T02D2379:12b-9: bsgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med //
T02D2379:12b-10: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul chen po yis //
T02D2379:12b-11: chos nyid thams cad bsdus byas nas //
T02D2379:12b-12: gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab //
T02D2379:12b-13: bsgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med //
T02D2379:12b-15: gcig nas nyi shu'i bar du ni //
T02D2379:12b-16: dngos po cir yang zhugs pa med //
T02D2379:12b-17: yi ge stong pa gsos su byin //
T02D2379:12b-18: gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab //
T02D2379:12b-19: bsgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med //
T02D2379:12b-20: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs ba'i rim pa zhes bya
T02D2379:12b-21: ba slob dpon bi r'u pa nas brgyud pa slob
